name.value: Aliens vs. Predator: Alien Resurrection Expansion Set

item.description:
The Resurrection has arrived.

Welcome to the Alien Resurrection, the anxiously awaited first expansion to the acclaimed Alien vs. Predator CCG. This expansion adds new excitement to the original game by introducing new play tactics, a new official scenario, and new applications for the original cards.

Available in 9-Card Booster Packs, Alien Resurrection introduces new card types such as Barriers, Battle Conditions, Attachments, and Ammo, along with the Human Rogue and Cloned Alien factions.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
